channel.title: RNA-Seq on In Data We Trust
channel.description: Recent content in RNA-Seq on In Data We Trust

item.title: Reproducing iDEP analyses with auto-generated R Markdown
item.description: iDEP is a tool for interactive analysis of RNA-Seq data. After analyzing their data, users have the option to download a R Markdown file, toegether with other data files, to reproduce the entire workflow. 1. Read data R packages and iDEP core Functions. Users can also download the iDEP_core_functions.R file. Many R packages needs to be installed first. This may take hours. Each of these packages took years to develop.
